CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 24, 1945 Page 23 reads: First Timers--The faithful came out en masse on Christmas Eve to be on hand for the official opening of the Continental Bar in Crawford Grill No.2.Bottom: A crowd of merry-makers put the okay stamp on the new room."--Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women and men, possibly including Bob Maloney, Mildred "Pinky" Greenway, Ruby Woods, Dolores Thompson Slater, Robert E. "Pappy" Williams, Mary Louise Harris Lewis, and Charles Lewis wearing light colored hat, gathered at bar in Continental Bar in Crawford Grill No. 1
